summary: Completed comprehensive testing of TechAssist IT support ticket system. All major functionality working correctly including user authentication, ticket management, role-based access control, and technician workflows.

minor_issues.issue: APScheduler appears to have shut down - automatic priority escalation may not be working
minor_issues.impact: Tickets may not automatically escalate from baja->media (24h) and media->alta (48h)

accessibility_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent components

action_item_for_main_agent: Investigate and fix the APScheduler shutdown issue to ensure automatic priority escalation is working. The scheduler should run continuously in the background to escalate ticket priorities after 24h (baja->media) and 48h (media->alta).
